Job Description: We are looking for 4-5 technically sound candidates with  Python/C#/Angular/Java/MongoDB experience to join our development team.Roles and Responsibilities  Candidate will be working with our development team supporting in all functions. Will be responsible for resolving simple and straight-forward user change requests.Candidate should help team to fix any kind of technical issues.Enhance existing systems by analyzing business objectives, preparing an action plan and identifying areas for modification and improvementDesired Candidate Profile  Candidate should be technically sound in any one/two mentioned programming skills:  Python/C#/Angular/Java/MongoDB development experience.Knowledge of GIT, CICD process and Micro services. Working knowledge in Agile-Scrum SDLC will be an added advantage. Good Communication (written and verbal) and problem solving skills.Candidates with working experience as a full stack developer with one or more programming skills will be preferred. Candidate should be a team player
